verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to them that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H5833>help;<s%> and <S%H8172>stay<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H7227>many;<s%> and in <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6105>strong;<s%> but they <S%H8159>look<s%> not to the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD!<s%>

Yet he <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and will not <S%H5493>call<s%> <S%H5493>back<s%> his <S%H1697>words:<s%> but will <S%H6965>arise<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7489>evildoers,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5833>help<s%> of them that <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity.<s%>

Now the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> are <S%H120>men,<s%> and not <S%H410>God;<s%> and their <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and not <S%H7307>spirit.<s%> When the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> both he that <S%H5826>helps<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall,<s%> and he that is <S%H5826>helped<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> down, and they <S%H3605>all<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoken<s%> to me, Like as the <S%H738>lion<s%> and the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H1897>roaring<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H2964>prey,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> a <S%H4393>multitude<s%> of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> forth <S%H5921>against<s%> him, he will not be <S%H2865>afraid<s%> of their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6031>abase<s%> himself for the <S%H1995>noise<s%> of them: <S%H3651>so<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H6633>fight<s%> for <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and for the <S%H1389>hill<s%> thereof.

As <S%H6833>birds<s%> <S%H5774>flying,<s%> <S%H3652>so<s%> will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H1598>defend<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H1598>defending<s%> also he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> it; and <S%H5674>passing<s%> over he will <S%H4422>preserve<s%> it.
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> you to him from <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H5627>revolted.<s%>

For in that <S%H3117>day<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3988>cast<s%> <S%H3988>away<s%> his <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and his <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your own <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> to you for a <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

Then shall the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> not of a <S%H376>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> not of a <S%H120>mean<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> him: but he shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and his <S%H970>young<s%> men shall be <S%H4522>discomfited.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to his <S%H5553>strong<s%> <S%H5553>hold<s%> for <S%H4032>fear,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> shall be <S%H2865>afraid<s%> of the <S%H5251>ensign,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H217>fire<s%> is in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and his <S%H8574>furnace<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
